title: Ticket #7810: feedback on condor-c solution for Nikhef and laptop submits to OSG?
remarks:
2020-Aug-26 08:40:37 by bbockelm:
Just stumbled across this ticket...

One thought: why Condor-C and not just condor remote submit? If this really is meant to be "laptop" level, I assume that the source (laptop) schedd will have long periods of unavailability. There's an internal lease mechanism on condor-c jobs which might expire while the laptop is closed.

Remote submit also has the advantage of not needing edits to the submit file.

That said, I don't have the context and this option might have already been eliminated.
